Welcome to To-Dool!

To-Dool is a small Todo List project made under the umbrella of the FullStack Javascript course of The Odin Project.

My goal is to make a fully functional Todo List with a minimalist aesthetic, and pair it with a Web Storage API so you can use it on a daily basis like any other Todo app.

The projects are limited to 10, and ToDo's are limited to 6 per project. I chose this limits primarly with an aesthetically purpose, and also because I wanna make clear that To-Dool is a very small project.

As I'm still learning the WebDev basis, feel free to contact me via Github if you encounter any error, or have some advice for a rookie.

Hope you like it!
